title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Experiencing excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example, if the window is resized vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, minimizing the flashing.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically. 
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
